com.simsilica.es

Interface Entity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WatchedEntity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEntity, DefaultWatchedEntity

    public interface Entity
    Associates an entity ID to a set of data components that represents some of the aspects of that entity, ie: an "entity view". An Entity may not have all components available depending on implementation. It is only guaranteed to have the components available that were the criteria for its query.
